import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { activeLink: string = 'home'; setActiveLink(link: string) { this.activeLink = link; } menuOpen = false; toggleMenu() { this.menuOpen = !this.menuOpen; } }
